abstract: Martha Schwendener reviews mixed media group exhibit Weird Science at Marianne Boesky Gallery.
lead_paragraph: This show at Marianne Boesky Gallery melds science and art, and the results verge on the fantastic and paranormal.

headline.main: Review: ‘Weird Science,’ a Group Show of Experimental Art
headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Weird Science,’ a Group Show of Experimental Art

snippet: This show at Marianne Boesky Gallery melds science and art, and the results verge on the fantastic and paranormal.
